Name: Creation and publicization of an online portal for vulnerable and homebound individuals to voluntarily facilitate their inclusion in outreach and recovery efforts during emergencies.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation and publicization of an online portal for vulnerable and homebound individuals to voluntarily facilitate their inclusion in outreach and recovery efforts during emergencies
BodyName: Committee on Mental Health and Substance Use

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Mental Health and Substance Use
